title: Penalty
context: ยง6K-8 Penalty. Any person who violates any of the laws or rules applicable to the island reserve shall be guilty of a petty misdemeanor and shall be fined not more than $1,000 or imprisoned not more than thirty days, or both, for each offense. Each day of each violation shall be deemed a separate offense. [L 1993, c 340, pt of ยง2; am L 1997, c 66, ยง2] Case Notes Cited: 132 H. 36, 319 P.3d 1044 (2014).
